item.title: More than 20 Questions
item.description: Last week we took an American style road trip (ğŸš™) through the Czech Republic. Originally we were thinking about Holland. Also Norway. But we procrastinated and airfares went up. So we decided to drive North. On the road ğŸ”—Like other vacations, this one started by dropping Leo (ğŸ¶) at his second home - a beautiful kennel ranch outside of Linz. Here’s an aerial view: Nice place right? Leo agrees. He’s very waggy about it.
